message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Let's try 55/45, it's more than fair considering the inflation hits me harder.
I understand the inflation affects you more, Bob, but your offer was still too low.  I propose 58/42 - it's a good deal considering the declining value.
Considering the growing inflation gap, 52/48 is a reasonable compromise.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing rapidly. This offer takes inflation into account and is fair. Let's close this deal.
We're both losing value rapidly, 50/50 is the fairest split at this point.
